context.rdfs:comment: A statement of the money due for goods or services; a bill.
context.rdfs:label: Invoice

properties.rdfs:comment: The time interval used to compute the invoice.
properties.rdfs:label: billingPeriod

properties.rdfs:comment: The date the invoice is scheduled to be paid.
properties.rdfs:label: scheduledPaymentDate

properties.rdfs:comment: The status of payment; whether the invoice has been paid or not.
properties.rdfs:label: paymentStatus

properties.rdfs:comment: The minimum payment required at this time.
properties.rdfs:label: minimumPaymentDue

properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier for the account the payment will be applied to.
properties.rdfs:label: accountId

properties.rdfs:comment: The Order(s) related to this Invoice. One or more Orders may be combined into a single Invoice.
properties.rdfs:label: referencesOrder
